text: T cells were rested in serum-free AIM-V medium ( Life Technologies ) overnight .

3.5 mug of the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reporter vector and 0.5 mug phRL-TK were added to 3 x 106 <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells resuspended in 100 muL of Nucleofector solution ( Amaxa Biosystems ) and electroporated using the U-15 program of the Nucleofector .

After a 24-h culture in serum-free conditions and stimuli as indicated in the figures , <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity was measured by the dual <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> assay system ( Promega Biotech ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .
Data were normalized by the activity of renilla <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
